title: Why is this hjappening
body:
Rito on my account I keep getting back to back leaver busters. and haven't been able to play, what's wrong? 
Just noticed you guys have emojis, this is how I feel: {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} Side note: Is that Pepe the Frog, you know he is a hate symbol right lol XD. Just noticed I had a typo in my title after posting, seems that I can't fix it :l, feels bad man.

replies.body:
Leaverbuster places a penalty on your account if you consistently leave or go AFK. Check out our FAQ on this system [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any other questions.
